Unarmoured Defense Information

While not wearing armour, you add your Constitution Modifier (to your Dexterity) to your Armour Class. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit. Wearing Heavy Amour impedes your Rage.

How to unlock Unarmoured Defense

Unarmored Defense (Barbarian) can be acquired by: Barbarian Level 1

Barbarian Level 1

Unarmoured Defense Tips & Notes

Unarmored Defense does not stack when multiclassing as a Monk/B
